mapper.sql: A.id as A_id, A.parent_id as A_parent_id, A.name as A_name, A.remark as A_remark, A.department_id as A_department_id, A.company_id as A_company_id, A.record_status as A_record_status, A.update_count as A_update_count, A.create_date as A_create_date, A.creator_id as A_creator_id, A.update_date as A_update_date, A.updater_id as A_updater_id, A.data_power as A_data_power
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_position A
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_position (parent_id, name, remark, department_id, company_id, record_status, update_count, create_date, creator_id, update_date, updater_id, data_power ) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataPower,jdbcType=CHAR} )
